items.sentence: Tom was surprised to find Mary sitting all alone in the chapel.
Tom was wearing black leather pants and a black leather jacket.
Tom went to a nearby convenience store to buy something to eat.
Tom certainly didn\'t expect Mary to take care of his children.
Tom couldn\'t come see us for Christmas, so we went to see him.
The police took pictures of the cigarette burns on Tom\'s body.
Tom and Mary didn\'t tell anyone they were planning to do that.
My French hasn\'t gotten any better since the last time we met.
I think Mary is one of the most beautiful women I\'ve ever met.
It looks like Tom has an alibi for the night Mary was murdered.
